import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import './style2.css' import CreateUser from '../CreateUser' import AlterPassword from '../AlterPassword' import ListUsers from '../ListUsers' import AddRoom from '../AddRoom' import UpdateRoom from '../UpdateRoom' import LogoutSystem from '../Logout' import DeleteRoom from '../DeleteRoom' import DeleteUser from '../DeleteUser' import ActionAlert from '../ActionAlert/index' function Administration() { const action = [ , , , , , , ] const [optionCurrent,setOptionCurrent] = useState(0) const [create,setCreate] = useState(0) const [deleter,setDelete] = useState(0) const [update,setUpdate] = useState(0) function handleAdministration(optionSidebar){ if(optionSidebar === "user"){ setOptionCurrent(0) setCreate(0) setDelete(6) setUpdate(1) }else if(optionSidebar === "hall") { setOptionCurrent(3) setCreate(3) setDelete(5) setUpdate(4) } } useEffect(()=>{ setCreate(0) setDelete(6) setUpdate(1) },[]) function handleSidebar(valor){ if(valor == 0){ document.getElementById("container-sidebar").style.left = "-300px"; }else { document.getElementById("container-sidebar").style.left = "0px"; } } return ( <>
